name: Foxtrot Sector Episode 1 : In the jaws of the Swarm!
shortName: Foxtrot Sector Episode 1 : In the jaws of the Swarm!
description:
TPS (Third Person Shooter) Campaign

This story happens in the far away Foxtrot Sector which has been peaceful for years until strange events happened throughout the sector ... You, Specialist "Shadow" Detlon and your best friend Andrew Leighton are part of a top secret organization that gather informations in the back of the Foxtrot Union and your current mission is to investigate about the Stellar Battlecruiser mysterious crash on Vaadelos... One thing matter... Will you survive against what may lurk there?

Credits goes to "martinolsson" for his TPS engine [http://www.sc2mapster.com/profiles/martinolsson/](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/profiles/martinolsson/>)
author: _ForgeUser4867036
